experience.title: Strategy Consulting intern
experience.description: - Worked with the founding team to conduct primary and secondary research to seek willingness of around 250 I&A management to adopt sustainable business practices- Based on the findings of the primary research an engagement framework with a detailed service offering and a 18 month pilot program has been developed along with a detailed GTM strategy - The ideated service offering is under the process of commercialization by the company management-> White Paper under review

experience.title: Summer Internship
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Led a team of 2 trainees to analyse failures in an old storage building and propose a new design for the building. ‚Ä¢ Created an estimation model using MS Excel to estimate the materials required for the construction of a new storage building. ‚Ä¢ Presented and submitted design was accepted by IOCL for further construction work.

experience.title: Internship Trainee
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Led a team of 3 trainees for the supervision and maintenance of a G+8 parking building to monitor the cost of materials in the construction. ‚Ä¢ Worked in tandem with the Deputy Project Consultant to develop a time plan of construction of the 100 cr project.‚Ä¢ Supervised the inflow and outflow of materials at the site and computed day to day estimation of the required materials using MS Excel.
